name: Squat
description: A great lower body exercise that works the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Bench Press
description: Targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Deadlift
description: A powerful full-body movement that focuses on the back and legs.

name: Pull-Up
description: A great bodyweight movement for building upper-body strength.

name: Barbell Row
description: Targets the upper and mid-back muscles.

name: Bicep Curl
description: Isolates the biceps for maximum growth.

name: Tricep Dips
description: A bodyweight movement that targets the triceps.

name: Lunges
description: Improves balance and strengthens the legs.

name: Leg Press
description: A lower body movement that isolates the quads.
